description: Ministry of Labour Trade Union Relations & Sabaragamuwa Development - Appointed Mr. W. N. S. Wickramasingha and 02 others as members of the Wages Board for the Printing Trade for three years period from 01st of August, 2017 - Appointed Mr. A. Dissanayake & 02 others as members of the Wages Board for the Ice, Aerated Waters, Fruit & Jam Manufacturing Trade for a 03 years period from 01st of July, 2017 - Appointed Mr. P. K. Perera & Others as Members of the Wages Board for the Engineering Trade for 03 years period from 01st July, 2017
